overview_summary: All five neighboring landowners have no clearly documented stance on the proposed development, as none were found to have made public comments or taken positions in local forums. Their influence in the community appears low, with no high-profile roles or notable community leadership among them. This suggests outreach will need to be personalized since none are established community influencers or vocal development critics.

neighbors.name: Nana M. Hayles
neighbors.claims: Nana M. Hayles is listed as a property owner in Spotsylvania County tax records ([gis.spotsylvania.va.us](https://gis.spotsylvania.va.us/arcgis/rest/services/PublicHearingCases/Public_Hearing_Mailing_List/FeatureServer/0#:~:text=true%2C%20length%3A%203%2C%20defaultValue%3A%20null%2C,defaultValue%3A%20null%2C%20modelName%3A%20STATE)). No meeting minutes or news reports were found that indicate any public stance or involvement by Hayles in local development issues ([spotsylvania66.rssing.com](https://spotsylvania66.rssing.com/chan-6338001/all_p2.html#:~:text=%E2%86%A7%20%E2%86%A7%20Nan%20Row%20Kate,of%20my%20third%20great%20grandfather)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Reach out one-on-one to learn her perspective, as she has no recorded position.
